name: Escape! (itch) (Rocío Campo, Requenisima21)
description:
Synopsis

In a distant village, there is a lonely house. It is said that one day a widow woman lived and died because of love. In their classes, this house is the favorite entertainment for the children, but anyone who steps inside is unable to leave. Are you allowed to leave?

Objetive

Use your VR headset to try to escape your home

Controls

To interact with the scene, press the button on the headset.
You must look at the ground to move your character
